value.verse: I will cry aloud to God; *
value.halfverse: I will cry aloud, and he will hear me.

value.verse: In the day of my trouble I sought the Lord; *
value.halfverse:
my hands were stretched out by night and did not tire;
 I refused to be comforted.

value.verse: I think of God, I am restless, *
value.halfverse: I ponder, and my spirit faints.
I am troubled and I cannot speak.
value.verse: You will not let my eyelids close; *

value.halfverse: I remember the years long past;
value.verse: I consider the days of old; *

value.halfverse: I ponder and search my mind.
value.verse: I commune with my heart in the night; *
Will the Lord cast me off for ever? *
value.halfverse: will he no more show his favor?
has his promise failed for evermore?
value.verse: Has his loving-kindness come to an end for ever? *
Has God forgotten to be gracious? *
value.halfverse: has he, in his anger, withheld his compassion?
the right hand of the Most High has lost its power.”
value.verse: And I said, “My grief is this: *
I will remember the works of the LORD, *
value.halfverse: and call to mind your wonders of old time.
and ponder your mighty deeds.
value.verse: I will meditate on all your acts *

value.halfverse: who is so great a god as our God?
value.verse: Your way, O God, is holy; *

value.halfverse: and have declared your power among the peoples.
value.verse: You are the God who works wonders *
By your strength you have redeemed your people, *
value.halfverse: the children of Jacob and Joseph.
the very depths were shaken.
value.verse:
The waters saw you, O God;
the waters saw you and trembled; *

value.halfverse: your arrows flashed to and fro;
value.verse:
The clouds poured out water;
the skies thundered; *

The sound of your thunder was in the whirlwind;
your lightnings lit up the world; *
value.halfverse: the earth trembled and shook.

value.verse:
Your way was in the sea,
and your paths in the great waters, *
value.halfverse: yet your footsteps were not seen.
by the hand of Moses and Aaron.
value.verse: You led your people like a flock *
